goal.tools.debugger

Enum SteppingDebugger.RunMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SteppingDebugger.RunMode>
      • goal.tools.debugger.SteppingDebugger.RunMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<SteppingDebugger.RunMode>
    Enclosing class:
    SteppingDebugger

    public static enum SteppingDebugger.RunMode
extends java.lang.Enum<SteppingDebugger.RunMode>
    Possible run modes of the debugger.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      FINESTEPPING
      Like stepping, but in this mode the agent will be paused at ANY next breakpoint (and not just on the ones set with Debugger#addPause(Channel)).
      KILLED
      Corresponding agent process has been killed.
      PAUSED
      Agent has stepped onto a breakpoint and is not running anymore.
      REMOTEPROCESS
      Process is remote, unknown.
      RUNNING
      Agent runs and does not pause on any of the breakpoints.
      STEPPING
      Agent is in stepping mode.
      UNKNOWN
      Process state is unknown, may be any of above.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • RUNNING

        public static final SteppingDebugger.RunMode RUNNING
        Agent runs and does not pause on any of the breakpoints.

        Note that although breakpoints are passed over, associated messages of a breakpoint are independently reported from the observer's run mode, based on viewing subscriptions to a channel.

      • STEPPING

        public static final SteppingDebugger.RunMode STEPPING
        Agent is in stepping mode. In this mode, agent will be PAUSED at the next breakpoint that is set with Debugger#addPause(Channel). Note that it will effectively be running if no breakpoints were set.

      • FINESTEPPING

        public static final SteppingDebugger.RunMode FINESTEPPING
        Like stepping, but in this mode the agent will be paused at ANY next breakpoint (and not just on the ones set with Debugger#addPause(Channel)). When the agent actually reached the breakpoint the state changes to PAUSED.

      • PAUSED

        public static final SteppingDebugger.RunMode PAUSED
        Agent has stepped onto a breakpoint and is not running anymore. Call Debugger#step() or Debugger#finestep() to step to next breakpoint.

      • KILLED

        public static final SteppingDebugger.RunMode KILLED
        Corresponding agent process has been killed. Agent has been terminated. Debugger will immediately throw a ThreadDeath when it discovers this run mode.

      • UNKNOWN

        public static final SteppingDebugger.RunMode UNKNOWN
        Process state is unknown, may be any of above. This is actually a hack, only used by the environment to indicate that we don't know the environment's runstate.

      • REMOTEPROCESS

        public static final SteppingDebugger.RunMode REMOTEPROCESS
        Process is remote, unknown. prio is 0, indicating everything more informative than this should be preferred.

      • getPriority
